title: Accountancy
shortDescription: Build a foundation in financial recording, reporting, and core accounting principles.
overview: This Level 3 Accountancy course introduces core accounting concepts, financial records, and reporting basics to prepare learners for further study or entry-level roles11.

title: Business Management
shortDescription: Develop management knowledge across planning, leadership, and business operations.
overview: This Level 3 Business Management course covers essential management principles including leadership, communication, and business operations to support progression into higher education.

title: Business Studies
shortDescription: Explore how businesses operate, compete, and grow in real markets.
overview: This Level 3 Business Studies course introduces key business functions such as marketing, finance, and operations, helping learners build a strong base for university entry.

title: Employability and Workplace Skills
shortDescription: Strengthen communication, teamwork, and workplace readiness for career success.
overview: This Level 3 Employability and Workplace Skills course develops practical skills such as communication, problem-solving, and professional behaviours needed for employment and progression.

title: Engineering
shortDescription: Gain an introduction to engineering concepts, systems, and problem-solving approaches.
overview: This Level 3 Engineering course introduces engineering principles and practical thinking to prepare learners for technical progression routes.

title: Health & Social Care
shortDescription: Learn the basics of caring roles, safeguarding, and person-centred support.
overview: This Level 3 Health & Social Care course covers essential knowledge for supporting people in care settings, including safeguarding and communication, supporting progression to higher study.

title: Information Technology
shortDescription: Build core IT knowledge: systems, data, networks, and practical digital skills.
overview: This Level 3 Information Technology course introduces IT fundamentals including systems, networks, data and security, preparing learners for computing pathways.

title: People and Organisations
shortDescription: Understand how people, teams, and organisational structures drive performance.
overview: This Level 3 People and Organisations course explores workplace behaviour, teamwork, and organisational structures to support university entry and employability.
